name: Vancouver Distillery Tour
description: The craft distilling movement has exploded in British Columbia and Vancouver boasts some of the best local artisans creating award winning spirits. We visit three distilleries where we sample various handcrafted spirits such as vodka,  We also get a private tour of the distilling facilities and learn from the distillers themselves how they create such boozy masterpieces. A great tour to learn more about how distilling is done, sample a variety of spirits, and pick up a bottle for later!
